content.query:
create database [appdb]

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'P@ssword@123';

create DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL CredSaasToken
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bt&srt=sco&sp=rwlcuy&se=2023-10-27T20:20:33Z&st=2023-10-20T12:20:33Z&spr=https&sig=9CqopMWJAGr2KUxkKaOU0D4h67K5Spna5K5Rzo23%2Fog%3D'
;

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ds_log_data 
with (LOCATION = 'https://storagegen2kr.blob.core.windows.net/csv-container',
        CREDENTIAL = CredSaasToken);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata]
(
    [Correlation id] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operation name] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Event category] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [datetime] NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Event initiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource type] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource group] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL)
WITH(
    LOCATION = '/Log.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=ds_log_data,
    FILE_FORMAT=TextFileFormat
)

select * from logdata
